Make the bread box out of materials that are naturally resistant to mold and mildew to keep the bread fresh for a longer period of time.
Incorporate a ventilation system into the bread box to allow for air circulation and prevent the bread from becoming stale.
Add a removable tray or divider to the bread box to allow for better organization and easier access to individual slices of bread.
